meanings.definition: Relating to or containing uric acid.
meanings.sent1: The doctor explained that the uric acid levels in my blood were high.
meanings.sent2: The uric acid crystals formed in the joints, causing pain and inflammation.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly added too much uric acid to the dish, giving it a sour taste.
meanings.sent4: The uric acid content in the solution was so high that it dissolved the metal.
meanings.sent5: The scientist studied the effects of uric acid on different materials in the lab.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or derived from urine.
meanings.sent1: The uric smell in the bathroom indicated that someone had not flushed.
meanings.sent2: The uric odor in the room made it clear that the cat had an accident.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the uric scent in public restrooms, causing laughter.
meanings.sent4: The uric stains on the carpet revealed the puppy's mischief.
meanings.sent5: The janitor used a special cleaner to remove the uric stains from the floor.

meanings.sent1: The artist used a paint color that had a uric hue, resembling urine.
meanings.sent2: The uric appearance of the liquid in the container raised suspicions.
meanings.sent3: The prankster filled the water balloons with a uric liquid, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The uric color of the potion made it look unappealing.
meanings.sent5: The old book had a distinct uric smell, reminiscent of urine.
